function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of overhumidification increasing the potential of mold growth","Impact":"Increased risk of mold growth and associated health hazards","Mitigation":"Monitor and control indoor humidity levels to prevent overhumidification","Technologies":"Humidity sensors, dehumidification systems","People":"Building administrators, occupants","Owner":"Building administrators, HVAC contractors"},{"Description":"Increased RH may lead to increased buildup on filters, decreasing airflow","Impact":"Reduced airflow and efficiency of the HVAC system","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of filters to prevent buildup","Technologies":"Filter monitoring and cleaning systems","People":"Building operators, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building operators, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of capturing viral particles is increased with increased RH, but may lead to overhumidification","Impact":"Balancing the benefits of capturing viral particles with the risk of overhumidification","Mitigation":"Targeted in-room humidification, monitoring of humidity levels","Technologies":"In-room humidifiers, humidity monitoring systems","People":"Building administrators, occupants","Owner":"Building administrators, building maintenance staff"}]}
